How can anyone read that it is going to cost the Federal Government $99 billion to clean up their nuclear defense plants and say nuclear is environmentally cleaner than fossil fuels? Land around Chernobyl in Russia is to all intents permanently uninhabitable and Three Mile Island is still in the process of being decontaminated. No state wants the waste; no scientist has discovered how to neutralize it in over 40 years of trying. It is so lethal and long lasting that our great-, great-, great-grandchildren will still be guarding it. N. LAWRENCE St. James
